detail_desc: Fully lined bikini. Top with a racer back and open section at the hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Wide Alice band in satin-covered plastic with pearly beads and a draped detail at the top. Grosgrain at the ends.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Double elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elasticated hem. Medium support.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy viscose weave with a slightly wider neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Patterned, knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a zip at the back and two high slits at the front. Lined.
Imitation leather hi-tops with elasticated lacing at the front, loop at the back and a hook and loop tab at the top. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fine-knit liner socks designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have a ribbed section in the middle of the foot and elastication around the openings for optimum comfort.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Straight-cut jacket in imitation leather with a collar, press-studs down the front, and a yoke. Dropped shoulders, cuffs with press-studs, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and concealed front pockets.
Faux fur tube. Width 17 cm, circumference 73 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Belt in two rows of metal chain with a decorative buckle at the front. Adjustable length.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a straight-cut hem.

Padded jacket with a stand-up collar, zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Blouse in a double, textured, organic cotton weave with a short frilled collar, buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Shoulder bag in imitation patent leather with a semi-transparent handle, a wide, detachable shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Lined. Size approx. 7x13x20 cm.

Dress with a matching hairband in soft organic cotton. Sleeveless dress with buttons on the shoulders and a sewn-in bodysuit with elasticated hems and press-studs at the crotch. Hairband with a sewn-in knot at the front and covered elastic at the back of the neck.
Clamdiggers in washed cotton with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves.

Sports trousers in heavy jersey with taped details. Elasticated, drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for added mobility and wide ribbing at the hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre and lace with a mesh detail at the back, padded triangular cups that shape the bust and provide good support, and adjustable shoulder straps. No fasteners.
V-neck satin cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lace details.
Hat in a soft, textured knit with a small imitation leather appliqué at the front and a ribbed hem.
Lightweight puffer jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Trousers in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist, a zip fly and button, patch pockets at the sides and wide, straight legs.
Organza-covered Alice band with a tied bow on top.
Ankle boots in suede with a zip in one side, covered heals, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Long-sleeved top in thin, printed cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Chinos in slightly stretchy cotton twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Front pockets, flap back pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.
Ankle-length dungarees in cotton denim with buttons at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Three-part chest pocket, side and back pockets, and tapered legs.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Lightly padded sleep mask with a frill-trimmed front in a patterned weave with text embroidery, and a cotton jersey back. Narrow ties.
Cotton canvas trainers with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Slightly shorter jersey top with a print motif, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Short, straight-cut jacket in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Shoulder tabs with a button, large flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Skirt in a fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist and appliqués. Unlined.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace decorated with pearly plastic beads. Adjustable length 46-53 cm.
Jumper in a fine-knit modal and cotton blend with a ribbed polo neck and long sleeves.

Baby Exclusive. Shorts in soft, double-weave organic cotton with an elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons at the front, side pockets, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Detachable elastic braces.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with wide shoulder straps, lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Hi-tops in imitation leather and fabric with a padded edge, adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Fleece linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Popover jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and double-layered hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip at the top with a chin guard, a kangaroo pocket and a front pocket with a concealed zip. Elasticated cuffs and a concealed, elasticated drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining made from recycled polyester.
Dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at the waist. Gathered shoulders, short sleeves and a wide flounce at the hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Matching pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Short lace dress with a jersey bell-shaped skirt, a deep V-neck front and back with a scalloped trim and long sleeves. Partly lined.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and satin ribbon ties at the sides.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

ZlideOn zip tab to quickly repair a broken zip in your favourite garment. Can be used with metal and plastic zips that are 7.5 mm wide when closed. These zips are often in, for example, warm jackets. How to use: Remove the old zip tab and click on a ZlideOn tab of the right size and type.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Straight-cut top in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved top in jersey with a slightly wider neckline and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder, straight-cut blouse in a cotton weave with an elasticated top with a small frill trim. Wide, half-length raglan sleeves with broderie anglaise, and broderie anglaise at the hem.
Vest tops in cotton jersey. One with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.
Sandals with wide, crossover straps at the front and an adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather insoles.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Small shoulder bag with a metal chain shoulder strap, zip at the top and one inner compartment. Lined. Size 6x15x23 cm.
Straight T-shirt in soft, airy viscose slub jersey with a deep V-neck.
Short A-line skirt in wide-wale cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button and large patch front pockets. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Flared, calf-length skirt in a jacquard-weave with a burnout pattern and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Cropped top in soft cotton jersey with concealed elastication at the front of the top.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Wide elastic trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Block-striped cardigan in soft organic cotton with fine-knit and textured-knit sections, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, calf-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist and straight legs with frayed, raw-edge hems. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
